argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | symgext.s | |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | symgext.e | |- E = ( x e. N |-> if ( x = K , K , ( Z ` x ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( X = K -> ( E ` X ) = ( E ` K ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( x = K -> if ( x = K , K , ( Z ` x ) ) = K ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( K e. N /\ K e. N ) -> ( E ` K ) = K ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_anidms | |- ( K e. N -> ( E ` K ) = K ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( K e. N /\ X = K ) -> ( E ` X ) = K ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ex | |- ( K e. N -> ( X = K -> ( E ` X ) = K ) ) |
